metadata.name: Potentially Suspicious Execution From Tmp Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a potentially suspicious execution of a process located in the '/tmp/' folder

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND startswith(lower(process.name), lower('/tmp/')))

output.summary: Detects a potentially suspicious execution of a process located in the '/tmp/' folder
